text: Two official days into break and have been able to finish these two wonderful stories. Each story is poignant, timely and thought provoking. What a great way to begin summer break. #linked #theparkerinheritancebook

🙌🏻 🎉 Pure excitement for our new #scholasticbooks order!!! Can’t wait to dive into these with the kids 📚📓📖📕📒📔📘📝✒️✏️
